message: Let's start fair. I propose a 90/10 split. You get the smaller share this time, but remember, the value of your money decreases less than mine with each round.
Your turn, Alice. Let's be reasonable.  I'm proposing a 60/40 split in my favor. Time is money, and it's losing value fast.
I'm willing to compromise, but 60/40 is too much. I'm offering a 70/30 split.  This is the last time I'll make a proposal that's in your favor - next time, it's all about maximizing my own share.
Last chance for a deal like this, Alice.  55/45 is my final offer.  The clock is ticking, and soon those losses will start impacting you too.
I'm sticking to my guns. The value of your offer is decreasing faster than mine, so it's only fair to maximize my own share now.  This is my final offer - 80/20.
